price: 72. Tel est le Paradis dont vous avez été faits les héritiers en prix de vos actions.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
